Summary: I HEARD A LOUD NOISE AND I TURNED I WAS STARING AT A BALL OF WHITE LIGHT WITH A HIGH BEAM SHOOT INTO MY BEDROOM THRU THE WINDOW AND SHOT OUT AND MADE A LOUD NOISE AS IT ENTERED AND EXITED.
divs: Sighting DetailsIM 15YRS OLD, & LIVE IN SAN ANTONIO. AROUND 3AM OR 3:30 SOMETHING WOKE ME UP A STRANGE NOISE FROM OUTSIDE MY WINDOW. AS I LOOKED UP SOMETHING SHOT INTO MY ROOM, A WHITE BRIGHT BALL JUST IN THE MIDDLE. I LOOKED AT IT FOR ABOUT 5 SECS. WHILE IT WAS IN MY ROOM THERE WAS A STRANGE NOISE TO IT THAT I CANT EXPLAIN.AS I SAW THE BALL OF LIGHT IT SHOT OUT OF MY ROOM & MADE A LOUD NOISE AS IT LEFT IN A UFO. WHAT MADE THIS MORE INTRESTING TO ME IS THAT THE SAMEDAY THERE WAS ANOTHER UFO SIGHTING CAUGHT ON TAPE SIMILAR TO WHAT I SAW. AND THERE WAS ALSO MORE SIGHTINGS DURING THE SAME WEEK & COUPLE OF DAYS AFTER.
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around January 31st 2011
